title: Princess
description: This is Book 1 in the new Oath Keepers MC Nomads series.This is a sequel series to the Russkaya Mafiya/Oath Keepers MC series.Biker bitch? Not this chick. I can’t stand my father and his group of criminals and what better way to get back at my father, the President, then to sleep with one of them?Poor little Prospect, he never saw me coming.When my safety is jeopardized yet again by the MC, it’s not the Prospect to my rescue though, it’s a hell bound Nomad out for blood and my heart.
author: Sapphire Knight
